thread.title: Senior Financial Analyst - Permanent Job at Yoh (Charlotte, NC)
thread.title_full: Senior Financial Analyst - Permanent Job at Yoh (Charlotte, NC)

title: Senior Financial Analyst - Permanent Job at Yoh (Charlotte, NC)
text:
Source: Jobg8 
Senior Financial Analyst needed for a direct hire opportunity with Yoh's manufacturing client located in Charlotte, NC 
The Big Picture: - Senior Financial Analyst is responsible for applying principles of cost accounting and conduct studies that provide detailed cost information not supplied by general accounting systems. - Senior Financial Analyst Prepares and analyzes financial results versus established estimates at all levels of the organization. - Prepares and presents long term project reviews to upper management 
Top skills you should possess: - Accounting experience - Analysis and effective interpretation of Data 
What you'll be doing: - Senior Financial Analyst is Responsible for developing financial modelling, financial statement analysis, decision modelling, reporting and adhoc analysis to support strategic initiatives. - Conduct thorough research and analysis of variances to ensure data accuracy. - Assist in the continued development of financial analysis, financial forecasting, and modelling tools. 
What You Need to Bring to the Table: - Dynamics Great Plains Software knowledge - Develop Ad Hoc Reporting
